sentences.sContent: She was swindled out of ￡ 1,000 by a witch.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was swindled out of ￡ 1,000 by a witch.
sentences.sCn: 她被一个女巫骗了一千英镑。

sentences.sContent: The old witch said she could raise the dead.
sentences.sContent_eng: The old witch said she could raise the dead.
sentences.sCn: 老巫婆说她能起死回生。

sentences.sContent: A witch was supposed to take the shape of a cat.
sentences.sContent_eng: A witch was supposed to take the shape of a cat.
sentences.sCn: 据说女巫会化为猫的形状。

trans.tranOther: a woman who is supposed to have magic powers, especially to do bad things
